org.wildfly.swarm.spi.api

Interface SwarmProperties


  • public interface SwarmProperties
    This class defines all system properties used by Swarm

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String AJP_PORT
      Sets the AJP port to be used, defaults to 8009
      static String BIND_ADDRESS
      Interface to bind servers, defaults to 0.0.0.0
      static String CONSUL_URL
      Full qualified http address, i.e.
      static String CONTEXT_PATH
      The context path to be used, defaults to /
      static String DATABASE_DRIVER
      Database Driver name
      static String DATASOURCE_CONNECTION_URL
      JDBC Connection URL
      static String DATASOURCE_NAME
      Name of the datasource, i.e.
      static String DATASOURCE_PASSWORD
      Password for database access
      static String DATASOURCE_USERNAME
      Username for database access
      static String DEBUG_BOOTSTRAP
      If provided, the swarm container will log bootstrap information
      static String DEBUG_PORT
      If provided, the swarm process will pause for debugging on the given port.
      static String DEPLOYMENT_TIMEOUT
      Timeout, in seconds, to wait for a deployment to occur, defaults to 300
      static String ENVIRONMENT
      The environment this process is running on (eg.
      static String EXPORT_DEPLOYMENT
      Causes a deployed artifact to be dumped to disk when swarm starts, for debugging.
      static String HTTP_EAGER
      Since introducing the delayed open HTTP listeners, it has been determined that maybe it'd be useful to be able to eagerly open the listeners through usage of a property.
      static String HTTP_PORT
      Sets the HTTP port to be used, defaults to 8080
      static String HTTPS_PORT
      Sets the HTTPS port to be used, defaults to 8443
      static String PORT_OFFSET
      Sets a global port adjustment, defaults to 0
      static String PROJECT_STAGE
      Activates a stage in project-stages.yml
      static String PROJECT_STAGE_FILE
      A URL spec reference to a project stage file

    • Field Detail

      • EXPORT_DEPLOYMENT

        static final String EXPORT_DEPLOYMENT
        Causes a deployed artifact to be dumped to disk when swarm starts, for debugging. Defaults to false
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PORT_OFFSET

        static final String PORT_OFFSET
        Sets a global port adjustment, defaults to 0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BIND_ADDRESS

        static final String BIND_ADDRESS
        Interface to bind servers, defaults to 0.0.0.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HTTP_EAGER

        static final String HTTP_EAGER
        Since introducing the delayed open HTTP listeners, it has been determined that maybe it'd be useful to be able to eagerly open the listeners through usage of a property. If non-null, will cause the http listeners to not be lazy.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HTTP_PORT

        static final String HTTP_PORT
        Sets the HTTP port to be used, defaults to 8080
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AJP_PORT

        static final String AJP_PORT
        Sets the AJP port to be used, defaults to 8009
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HTTPS_PORT

        static final String HTTPS_PORT
        Sets the HTTPS port to be used, defaults to 8443
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONTEXT_PATH

        static final String CONTEXT_PATH
        The context path to be used, defaults to /
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEBUG_PORT

        static final String DEBUG_PORT
        If provided, the swarm process will pause for debugging on the given port. This option is only available when running an Arquillian test or mvn wildfly-swarm:run, not when executing java -jar. The latter requires normal Java debug agent parameters.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEBUG_BOOTSTRAP

        static final String DEBUG_BOOTSTRAP
        If provided, the swarm container will log bootstrap information
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ENVIRONMENT

        static final String ENVIRONMENT
        The environment this process is running on (eg. openshift)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROJECT_STAGE

        static final String PROJECT_STAGE
        Activates a stage in project-stages.yml
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROJECT_STAGE_FILE

        static final String PROJECT_STAGE_FILE
        A URL spec reference to a project stage file
        See Also:
        URL, Constant Field Values

      • CONSUL_URL

        static final String CONSUL_URL
        Full qualified http address, i.e. 'http://localhost:8500/'
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEPLOYMENT_TIMEOUT

        static final String DEPLOYMENT_TIMEOUT
        Timeout, in seconds, to wait for a deployment to occur, defaults to 300
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DATASOURCE_NAME

        static final String DATASOURCE_NAME
        Name of the datasource, i.e. 'ExampleDS'
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DATASOURCE_USERNAME

        static final String DATASOURCE_USERNAME
        Username for database access

        Constant Field Values
